siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, We have a jam-packed episode today. All the potential of a great anniversary episode but we are still not at one year of Life with a Twist of Lemon. To kick off the episode Jon had a couple of milkshakes on his trip. The first from Hubbard Avenue Diner with aâ€¦
